body:
Still seeing cases in Jenkins where this fails once in a while.  It looks like we list pods and they go away before we can get details on them.  This causes the 'kubecfg' command to fail and the entire thing exits with an error.

Output from Jenkins:

```
+ ./hack/../cluster/kubecfg.sh -expect_version_match -p 8080:80 run jbeda/update-demo:nautilus 2 update-demo
id: update-demo
creationTimestamp: 2014-10-09T17:21:35Z
selfLink: /api/v1beta1/replicationControllers/update-demo
resourceVersion: "40"
namespace: default
desiredState:
  replicas: 2
  replicaSelector:
    simpleService: update-demo
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: v1beta2
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers:
        - name: update-demo
          image: jbeda/update-demo:nautilus
          ports:
          - hostPort: 8080
            containerPort: 80
            protocol: TCP
          imagePullPolicy: ""
        restartPolicy:
          always: {}
    labels:
      simpleService: update-demo
currentState:
  replicas: 0
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: ""
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers: []
        restartPolicy: {}
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is created but not running
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/2
  2 out of 2 created
  b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is verified up and running
  b8c026c2-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4 is verified up and running
+ ./hack/../cluster/kubecfg.sh -expect_version_match resize update-demo 1
id: update-demo
creationTimestamp: 2014-10-09T17:21:35Z
selfLink: /api/v1beta1/replicationControllers/update-demo
resourceVersion: "53"
namespace: default
desiredState:
  replicas: 1
  replicaSelector:
    simpleService: update-demo
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: v1beta2
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers:
        - name: update-demo
          image: jbeda/update-demo:nautilus
          ports:
          - hostPort: 8080
            containerPort: 80
            protocol: TCP
          imagePullPolicy: ""
        restartPolicy:
          always: {}
    labels:
      simpleService: update-demo
currentState:
  replicas: 2
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: ""
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers: []
        restartPolicy: {}
Waiting for all containers in pod to come up. Currently: 0/1
  2 out of 1 created
F1009 17:22:58.127959 07087 kubecfg.go:395] Got request error: pod "b8bff367-4fd8-11e4-ba23-42010af076f4" not found
Cleaning up test artifacts
+ ./hack/../cluster/kubecfg.sh -expect_version_match stop update-demo
id: update-demo
creationTimestamp: 2014-10-09T17:21:35Z
selfLink: /api/v1beta1/replicationControllers/update-demo
resourceVersion: "56"
namespace: default
desiredState:
  replicas: 0
  replicaSelector:
    simpleService: update-demo
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: v1beta2
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers:
        - name: update-demo
          image: jbeda/update-demo:nautilus
          ports:
          - hostPort: 8080
            containerPort: 80
            protocol: TCP
          imagePullPolicy: ""
        restartPolicy:
          always: {}
    labels:
      simpleService: update-demo
currentState:
  replicas: 1
  podTemplate:
    desiredState:
      manifest:
        version: ""
        id: ""
        volumes: []
        containers: []
        restartPolicy: {}
+ ./hack/../cluster/kubecfg.sh -expect_version_match rm update-demo
update.sh returned 255; FAIL!
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: Update demo e2e test is flakey
